text:
@noschools2020 @msisodia @HRDMinistry @dmgbnagar @ChangeOrg_India Please Please Please no school until we are having zero COVID-19 cases  or corona vaccine. Our kids are not for experiment, we can't leave them in trouble... 
# NO SCHOOL
# NO ONLINE STUDY
# NO FEES

And atleast no online study for Nursery to Std. 4 Students.
